General.Name: Valeura Energy Inc
General.Description: Valeura Energy Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and production of petroleum and natural gas in Thailand and in Turkey. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: Bow Valley Square 1, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2R9
